    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Cinematograph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Cinematograph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cinématographe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Cinematógrafo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Macchina da presa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cinematograph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cinematógrafo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates how moving images are formed on a screen (how movies work)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cinema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">films</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates, wie bewegliche 
Bilder auf einem Bildschirm gebildet werden (wie Filmarbeit)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates comment des images 
mobiles sont formées sur un écran (comment travail de films)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates como as imagens 
moventes são dadas forma em uma tela (como trabalho dos filmes)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates come le immagini 
commoventi sono formate su uno schermo (come lavoro di film)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates πώς οι κινούμενες 
εικόνες διαμορφώνονται σε μια οθόνη (πώς εργασία κινηματογράφων)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates cómo las imágenes
móviles se forman en una pantalla (cómo trabajo de las películas)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
